title: What phone models does the TalkBand B2 support?
answer:
Huawei: X1, X2, Mate7, Mate2, Mate, P8,P8 Max, P7, P6, G7, G6, C199, Honor 6, Honor 6 Plus, Honor 3X, and Honor 3C 

 Samsung: Galaxy S5, Galaxy S4, Galaxy S3, Note4, Note3, and Note2 

 Apple: iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5, and iPhone 4s 

 HTC: One and One M8 

 Xiaomi: MI4 and MI3 

 Meizu: MX4 Pro, MX3, and MX2 

 LG: G3, G2, and Nexus 5 

 Motorola: Nexus X 

 Sony: Xperia Z1, Xperia Z2, and Xperia Z3 

 Note: The TalkBand B2 has passed all compatibility tests with the preceding phone models. The list is updated from time to time.
